# Controller Coordinate Transformation

> **Skill ID:** `prism-controller-transformation`
> **Category:** CONTROLLER
> **Version:** 2.0.0

## Description

Tilted plane, TCPC, RTCP

## Capabilities

- Handle coordinate transformation for all controller families

## Usage

This skill provides expertise in controller coordinate transformation.

### When to Use

- When working with controller
- When needing controller coordinate transformation capabilities

## Dependencies

- `prism-gcode-reference`

## Hooks

- `gcode:transformation:generate`
- `gcode:transformation:validate`
